p: This clinical study was designed as a randomized, 3-month placebo-controlled, single-blind clinical trial. A single examiner (SS), with more than 8 years of practice, collected the following clinical parameters: bleeding index, using FMBS and PI, using FMPS, on 6 surfaces; PD obtained by counting the number of pockets equal or greater than 5 mm; CAL recording the values equal to or greater than 4 mm, on 6 surfaces.
